sourceMeaningMnemonic: At the <radical>gate</radical>, you <radical>kiss</radical> <kanji>the cabinet</kanji> members, one by one. In order to gain access to this government building, you have to kiss all the members of the cabinet at the gate. What a strange ritual.
meaningInfo: Imagine kissing all the members of the cabinet. A lot of them are old men. Imagine kissing all of them at the gate. Eww.
readingMnemonic: You need to kiss each member of <kanji>the cabinet</kanji> to gain access to their building. And you need to get into the building to recover your <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>). Your prize winning cock has been captured by a member of the cabinet and you need to infiltrate their headquarters and recover your rooster!
readingInfo: Imagine yourself sneaking past the cabinet members, finding your cock, grabbing it, and getting out of there. You’ve recovered your rooster! The day is won.
